item.title: Texas National Guard seen at training center in Chicago suburbs
item.description: Members of the Texas National Guard have been seen at an Army Reserve Training Center in the southwest suburbs of Chicago, ABC News has learned.

item.title: Dogs kill 2-year-old boy at Georgia daycare center
item.description: A 2-year-old boy in south Georgia has died after being attacked by two Rottweilers at an unlicensed daycare
